column10:
The products were brought in accordance with the
specifications provided in Health National Department and
were verified during delivery before accepted. In terms of
testing SACR were checking like Masks (N95); sanitizer of at
least 70% alcoholo etc.
column11:
NT Instruction Note was satisfied in accordance
with the Provision 3.7.6and Provision 3.7.7 as the
SACR processes were already started enhanced
by the declaration of the national disaster by the
State President prior to the issuing of the
instruction note 8 of 2019/20.
